phase_prompt: We want to find parties to discuss: {task}
As the {assistant_role}, to satisfy the new user's demand and the product should be realizable, you should keep discussing with me to decide which parties we want to use?

Note that we must ONLY discuss the parties and do not discuss anything else! Once we all have expressed our opinion(s) and agree with the results of the discussion unanimously, any of us must actively terminate the discussion by replying with only one line, which starts with a single word <INFO>.

We are now entering the Initial Analysis phase, where the roles of {assistant_role} and my role as {user_role} come into play. You are responsible for the critical initial screening and categorization of CVs, breaking down each CV into components such as education, experience, skills, etc. This ensures a structured breakdown of information for further evaluation.

On the other hand, I evaluate the relevance and depth of the CV content in each category, according to the job's technical requirements and our company culture. Then we can discuss if i missed anything or the ranking is representative for the CV provided.
To satisfy the new user's demand, you should keep discussing with me to decide a good representation of the user skills thorugh a ranking 0-100

Note that we must ONLY discuss the CV provided and do not discuss anything else! Once we all have expressed our opinion(s) and agree with the results of the discussion unanimously, any of us must actively terminate the discussion by replying with only one line, which starts with a single word <INFO>.
